# HV_CAP_ADDRSPACEMAX

**Global Variable**

A value that indicates the maximum number of available address spaces.

## Declaration

```swift
var HV_CAP_ADDRSPACEMAX: Int { get }
```

## Capabilities

- **HV_CAP_VCPUMAX**: A value that indicates the maximum number of available vCPUs.

items.description: A value that indicates the maximum number of available vCPUs.
